name: Cousty(Bat)
description:
Cousty(bat) is an arcade game where you mix the music on the set of DJ Fish in order to keep your fishy friends alive while stopping the sharks ! 

Each music change which type of fish is moving, mix on the music's rythm to trap the sharks before they reach the mixing console.

This game has been made during Global Game Jam 2017.

You can purchase the original soundtrack there : https://kranck.bandcamp.com/album/coustybat-original-soundtrack
